SELECT bp.`pid`, bp.`uid`, (select `uname` from b_user u where u.`uid` = bp.`uid` ) as uname, (select `mobile` from b_user u where u.`uid` = bp.`uid` ) as mobile, (select icon_url from b_user u where u.`uid` = bp.`uid` ) as iconUrl, bp.`content`, bp.`piture_urls`, bp.`committee_id`, (select cname from b_committees bc where bc.`cid` = bp.`committee_id`) as committeeName, bp.`status`, bp.`address`, bp.`content_type`, bp.`create_time`, bp.`update_time` FROM b_photo_info bp
and exists (select 1 from b_user bu1 where bu1.`uid` = bp.`uid` and bu1.uname like concat('%',#{queryName},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from b_user bu1 where bu1.`uid` = bp.`uid` and bu1.mobile like concat('%',#{queryMobile},'%'))
and bp.`address` like concat('%',#{queryAddress},'%')
and bp.`content` like concat('%',#{queryContent},'%')
and CONCAT(',',bp.`content_type`,',') like CONCAT('%,',#{suoshuleixing},',%')
and bp.`uid` = #{queryUserId}
ORDER BY bp.create_time DESC
